          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Acid formation in air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saure Anordnung in einer Luft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation acide en air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação ácida no ar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione acida in aria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όξινος σχηματισμός στον αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación ácida en aire</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that sulphuric acid and nitric acids are formed in the air due to chemical reactions arising from erupting volcanoes and lightning flashes.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lightning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nitric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sulphuric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">volcano</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Schwefelsäure und 
Salpetersäuren in der Luft wegen der chemischen Reaktionen gebildet 
werden, die aus dem Ausbrechen der Vulkane und der Blitzblitze 
entstehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que l'acide sulfurique 
et les acides nitriques sont formés dans le ciel dû aux réactions 
chimiques résultant d'éclater des volcans et des flashes de foudre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o ácido sulfúrico e
os ácidos nitric estão dados forma no ar  devido às reações 
químicas que se levantam de erupting vulcões e flashes do 
relâmpago.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che l'acido solforico 
e gli acidi nitrici sono formati nell'aria dovuto le reazioni chimiche
in seguito a scoppiare i vulcani ed i flash del lampo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το θειικό οξύ και τα 
νιτρικά οξέα διαμορφώνονται στον αέρα λόγω των χημικών 
αντιδράσεων που προκύπτουν από τα ηφαίστεια και τις λάμψεις 
αστραπής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el ácido sulfúrico
y los ácidos nítricos están formados en el aire  debido a las 
reacciones químicas que se presentan de entrar en erupción los 
volcanes y los flashes del relámpago.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blitz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Salpetersäure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwefelsäure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vulkan</string>
          </keyword>
